description: Increase hearts endurance, lung capacity, muscle power and mental health.

name: Strength Training

name: Walking
description: Walking is a great way to improve or maintain your overall health

name: Yoga
description: Yoga lower blood pressure, strengthen the immune system and reduce stress levels.
